xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="Nf[jdByP%EAQV]WNQ~LN" x="-337" y="263">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="controls_loop_forever" id="U!RU.0f,mmvO_m|,Vk:(">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="bit_button_event" id="1dF*qZNd={|N2_Sn2sxn">
            <field name="var_">_bit_btnA_</field>
            <field name="event_">pressed</field>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id="VFM#lY9cx4q:!n-K1l6b">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="k^034t;c{(Mr|CBp5Gd%">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="#3W1F52^j`{,.TL`nz;A">
                    <field name="TEXT">WEN CHUN</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <next>
                  <block type="radio_channel_get" id="50P%2+Tiw_U!rdOyHRud">
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
                    <value name="name_">
                      <block type="text" id="_n{6B75pM:SPM+@TR3!?">
                        <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <statement name="do_">
                      <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="^E+M}%|J0.8tAo#=G?0O">
                        <field name="type_">1</field>
                        <field name="speed_">2</field>
                        <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                        <value name="str_">
                          <block type="radio_channel_value" id="h,rqx|I49nQRQ,ea%O#U"></block>
                        </value>
                        <value name="color_">
                          <block type="colour_picker" id="}~~pGM;/o*]t`Ha-7NlW">
                            <field name="COLOUR">#ff0000</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="bit_button_event" id="-TBr9_/y4|C?8=G;Hl[h">
                <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
                <field name="event_">pressed</field>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_off" id="OVYTvB;p,xiX:nJ+Dheb"></block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="delay" id="467AZgGS@W[y[39y=}rS">
                    <value name="secs_">
                      <block type="math_number" id="o5JYV2Z7VnMEtQCltNfO">
                        <field name="NUM">2</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
